title: Plato's Run
description:
Genre: Action

Year: 1997

Director: James Becket

Cast: Gary Busey, Roy Scheider, Steven Bauer, Jeff Speakman, Tiani Warden, Maggie Myatt, Horacio Le Don, Doug DeLuca, Deborah Magdalena, Melanie Chartoff, Salvador Levy, Marc Macaulay, Julie Upton, Chris Hinton, Mario Ernesto Sanchez.

Synopsis: Ex-Navy SEAL Plato Smith has his hands full with teenage daughter Kathy and a failing fishing business. When old flame Marta offers him big money to rescue two escaped prisoners off a beach in Cuba, Plato accepts. Under heavy fire, Plato and ex-SEAL buddy Sam Macris manage to rescue the escaped Cuban prisoner, Felix Gomez. But soon Plato is implicated in a murderous web of assassination and deceit, masterminded by a ruthless international arms dealer, Alex Senarkian. By the end, Plato must face all his deadly foes in a desperate attempt to clear his name and save his daughter.

RunTime: 95 min.

Video: Pal FullScreen, 4:3
Languages: Dolby Digital 2.0: English, Spanish
Subtitles: Spanish
Other features: Interactive menus, Scene access, Trailer

DVD: Original DVD-5

More Info: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119903/
